description: Monorepo Structure with Docus Documentation Site - Convert to pnpm workspaces and add comprehensive documentation for forkers

userStories.title: Initialize pnpm workspaces monorepo structure
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want the project restructured as a monorepo so that the main app and docs can share dependencies and be managed together.
acceptanceCriteria: Move existing app to apps/web/ using git mv to preserve history
Update root package.json with workspace scripts
pnpm dev runs the web app from root
userStories.notes: This is foundational - must complete before any other stories. Use git mv for history preservation.

userStories.title: Initialize Docus documentation site
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want a Docus-powered documentation site so that I can write docs in Markdown with automatic navigation.
acceptanceCriteria: Initialize Docus in apps/docs/ using latest stable version
Configure app.config.ts with Second Brain branding (title, description, socials)
Set up basic navigation structure in content/
pnpm --filter docs dev starts docs site on port 3001
Verify docs site loads in browser using dev-browser skill
userStories.notes: Use https://github.com/nuxt-content/docus for latest Docus setup instructions

userStories.title: Create Getting Started introduction documentation
